html.body:
Addressee [type the name and address (if applicable) of the recipient]
Subject: Good faith letter
Dear colleagues,
The chargeback team is in the process of reviewing the case containing the following details:
Case ID:
Merchant name:
Terminal number:
Card number:
Operation date:
ARN:
Operation amount/currency:
Disputed amount/currency:
RC:
Authorization code:
We encountered a technical error while processing the transaction in question; therefore, the transaction was processed late. However, we certify that your cardholder received the merchandise/service in full. Please find attached the transaction receipt showing that the transaction was properly performed by the merchant.
We encountered a technical error while dispensing cash at the ATM; the cardholder had received the requested amount, but the transaction was reversed in error/was not properly processed. Please find attached the ATM transaction record/a copy of the ATM audit tape/the internal transaction log [choose the appropriate variant] showing that the transaction was properly performed at the ATM.
We encountered a technical error while loading the cash cassette in the ATM ([specify the denomination] banknotes were loaded instead of [specify the denomination] banknotes). As a result, your cardholder received a greater amount than he/she actually requested.
Our merchant committed a mistake (an error in amount) while servicing the cardholder. The correct transaction amount should be [specify the amount]. Please find attached the itemized receipt proving that the cardholder received the merchandise/service in full for this amount.
[Choose the appropriate variant or type your own variant]
Unfortunately, we cannot initiate a second presentment according to the Visa/MasterCard rules, because we do not possess strong enough evidence to support the dispute. Please review this case and contact your cardholder to clarify the dispute if possible.
Your reply will be very much appreciated.
Sincerely yours,
Sender’s signature (if required)
Sender’s name/surname
Sender’s position
Sender’s contacts
